org.openjdk.tools.javac.util

类 JCDiagnostic.Factory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openjdk.tools.javac.util.JCDiagnostic.Factory
  • 封闭类:
    JCDiagnostic

    public static class JCDiagnostic.Factory
extends Object
    A factory for creating diagnostic objects.

      • error

        public JCDiagnostic error(JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticFlag flag,
                          DiagnosticSource source,
                          JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticPosition pos,
                          String key,
                          Object... args)
        Create an error diagnostic
        参数:
        source - The source of the compilation unit, if any, in which to report the error.
        pos - The source position at which to report the error.
        key - The key for the localized error message.
        args - Fields of the error message.

      • error

        public JCDiagnostic error(JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticFlag flag,
                          DiagnosticSource source,
                          JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticPosition pos,
                          JCDiagnostic.Error errorKey)
        Create an error diagnostic
        参数:
        source - The source of the compilation unit, if any, in which to report the error.
        pos - The source position at which to report the error.
        errorKey - The key for the localized error message.

      • mandatoryWarning

        public JCDiagnostic mandatoryWarning(Lint.LintCategory lc,
                                     DiagnosticSource source,
                                     JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticPosition pos,
                                     String key,
                                     Object... args)
        Create a warning diagnostic that will not be hidden by the -nowarn or -Xlint:none options.
        参数:
        lc - The lint category for the diagnostic
        source - The source of the compilation unit, if any, in which to report the warning.
        pos - The source position at which to report the warning.
        key - The key for the localized warning message.
        args - Fields of the warning message.
        另请参阅:
        MandatoryWarningHandler

      • create

        public JCDiagnostic create(JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticType kind,
                           DiagnosticSource source,
                           JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticPosition pos,
                           String key,
                           Object... args)
        Create a new diagnostic of the given kind, which is not mandatory and which has no lint category.
        参数:
        kind - The diagnostic kind
        source - The source of the compilation unit, if any, in which to report the message.
        pos - The source position at which to report the message.
        key - The key for the localized message.
        args - Fields of the message.

      • create

        public JCDiagnostic create(DiagnosticSource source,
                           JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticPosition pos,
                           JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticInfo diagnosticInfo)
        Create a new diagnostic of the given kind, which is not mandatory and which has no lint category.
        参数:
        source - The source of the compilation unit, if any, in which to report the message.
        pos - The source position at which to report the message.
        diagnosticInfo - The key for the localized message.

      • create

        public JCDiagnostic create(JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticType kind,
                           Lint.LintCategory lc,
                           Set<JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticFlag> flags,
                           DiagnosticSource source,
                           JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticPosition pos,
                           String key,
                           Object... args)
        Create a new diagnostic of the given kind.
        参数:
        kind - The diagnostic kind
        lc - The lint category, if applicable, or null
        flags - The set of flags for the diagnostic
        source - The source of the compilation unit, if any, in which to report the message.
        pos - The source position at which to report the message.
        key - The key for the localized message.
        args - Fields of the message.

      • create

        public JCDiagnostic create(Lint.LintCategory lc,
                           Set<JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticFlag> flags,
                           DiagnosticSource source,
                           JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticPosition pos,
                           JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticInfo diagnosticInfo)
        Create a new diagnostic with given key.
        参数:
        lc - The lint category, if applicable, or null
        flags - The set of flags for the diagnostic
        source - The source of the compilation unit, if any, in which to report the message.
        pos - The source position at which to report the message.
        diagnosticInfo - The key for the localized message.
